name: XPERT
body:
### Welcome to XPERT's Homepage.
XPERT is a tool for identifying cross-browser issues in web applications.
More description to come on this webpage.


### Experimental Data for ICSE 2012


### Authors and Contributors
* Shauvik Roy Choudhary (@shauvik)
* Mukul Prasad
* Alessandro Orso (@alexorso)

### Publications
A detailed list of publications on Cross-browser testing can be found at the following pages:
* Shauvik's academic homepage: http://www.cc.gatech.edu/~shauvik
* Mukul's research webpage: http://www.flacp.fujitsulabs.com/~mprasad/

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with XPERT? Check out the documentation or contact @shauvik and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
